title: Stay in a Country-Style Waterside Retreat at the Oldest Inn in the City
description: Discover the countless historic treasures of Sweden’s capital, from the Old Town of Gamla Stan to the Baroque-style Stockholm Palace and beyond. Enjoy the best of both worlds with a countryside-style boutique stay just a short distance from all the city’s attractions at Stallmästaregården, whose history dates back to the 17th century. Includes daily Scandinavian-style continental buffet breakfast.

title: Boutique Escape in the Heart of Stockholm with Courtyard Bar & Onsite Spa
description:
The historic and cultural wonders of Stockholm are on your doorstep at Villa Dagmar, a luxurious boutique hotel a stone’s throw from the beautiful Stureplan square. Ranked in the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, the hotel elegantly marries exclusive handpicked Scandinavian furnishings with Italian design. Recharge after busy days exploring the Swedish capital at the onsite Dagmar Spirit & Retreat spa or work up a sweat in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Then, refuel with Mediterranean fusion favourites at the onsite restaurant or enjoy a tipple under the glass roof of the charming courtyard Garden bar.

From here, the entire city is at your fingertips. Stockholm Central station, your gateway to all major Swedish cities, is just under three kilometres away. Spend your days exploring the world-famous Ӧstermalms Saluhall historic food hall before ticking off the city’s best sights, including The Royal Palace, Skansen open-air museum and ABBA The Museum.
